mcm.utils
Class MCMRuntimeException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          java.lang.RuntimeException
              mcm.utils.MCMRuntimeException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActorDeath
public class MCMRuntimeException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException

MCMRuntimeExceptions are thrown by classes in the mcm packages. Methods in mcm packages test their parameters and in some cases more general state invariants and throw MCMRuntimeExceptions, if results are unsatisfactory.

Author:
Monika Mevenkamp
See Also:

Method Detail

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Returns a short description of this throwable. Returns the unqualified class name of this exception, followed by ':', followed by the results of Throwable.getMessage() method for this exception.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Throwable
